thread.title: Build Amazing Shoulders and Shrink Your Belly With Just 3 Exercises
thread.title_full: Build Amazing Shoulders and Shrink Your Belly With Just 3 Exercises

author: Barry K
title: Build Amazing Shoulders and Shrink Your Belly With Just 3 Exercises
text:
Build Amazing Shoulders and Shrink Your Belly With Just 3 Exercises This workout kills two birds with one stone Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
Trainer: Alexia Clark, trainer and fitness model in METASHRED EXTREME , the new total-body workout program from Men’s Health that shreds fat and builds muscle. 
Benefit: Along with setting your shoulders on fire, this 3-move series works your lower body and core for a big calorie burn, Clark says. Advertisement 
Directions: Perform each of the following exercises for 40 seconds. Rest 20 seconds between each exercise.
